rows.label: qev017301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, speak of the devil.
I was just talking about you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0002
rows.name:
We've been getting tons of info from all our new data
probes recently. Now, is this just me, or did you install
pretty much all of them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Everybody's wondering how you're reaching so many
probe-placement sites so quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0004
rows.name:
But now that you're here, I can just ask! So?
You got a special system or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Kirsty about your own unique method.

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0020
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0021
rows.name: Shrug. Then raise your eyebrows mysteriously.

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ah, I see... Wow. Even the developers of FrontierNav
never thought of going about it like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0006
rows.name: I'm so pleased to have met someone like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0007
rows.name:
Are you kidding me? What, you think you're competing
with every single Pathfinder now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Ah, forget it. If a competitive spirit leads you to
install data probes like a [ST:gender p1=madman p2=madwoman ], so be it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oh, and while I have you, I've got a job that involves
mining for aurorite in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0010
rows.name:
There's also a bounty out on some nectar scirpos
that have been causing trouble in the region.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0011
rows.name:
And finally, we've picked up the signal of a new
data unit out in Sylvalum as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0012
rows.name:
You should be able to do all of these in your sleep,
so get out there and show my fellow Pathfinders how
it's done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Er, you don't mind, do you?
The others really look up to you at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0014
rows.name: Plus I'll give you a special treat when you're finished...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'll tell you what's inside all those classified data
units you've been retrieving![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Kirsty you're dying to know
what is in those data units.

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0040
rows.name: Rebuke

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Kirsty why she's throwing around
access to classified information.

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0016
rows.name:
I thought that would pique your interest.
Sorry to have kept you in the dark so long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0017
rows.name: I'd actually planned to keep this one to myself, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0018
rows.name: Well, I want you to know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Hey, sometimes a girl just wants to be a rebel.
Plus, everyone else who knew about it is gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0020
rows.name:
And I guess I don't want to be the only person
who knows.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0021
rows.name: All right, off you go. I expect the usual perfection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'm curious to see how you use FrontierNav to dig up
all that aurorite.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0023
rows.name:
I'll be watching the data feed with interest,
so get out there and wow me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0024
rows.name:
You made finding all that aurorite look like it was a
total snap! Everyone watching you was floored.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now you just need to take care of the other two
objectives in Sylvalum. No sweat for you, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Don't tell me you're done already? Hot damn!
You never cease to amaze...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0027
rows.name:
A lot of Pathfinders tried their hands at this one before
you, you know? Just in case your head wasn't swollen
enough already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0028
rows.name:
You're the real deal, [ST:playername ].
A BLADE worthy of taking up my colleagues' mantle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0029
rows.name:
So I can tell you about what was in those data units
now. I mean, if you want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0050
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0051
rows.name: Hear Kirsty's story.

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0060
rows.name: Yawn

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0061
rows.name:
Tell Kirsty that you just want your reward,
not some boring story.

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0030
rows.name:
Thanks. It's a bit of a long story, to be honest,
but I appreciate your patience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0031
rows.name:
Please, don't joke about thisâ€”it's important to me.
Just hear me out, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0032
rows.name:
When the Earthlife Colonization Project was started,
the question arose as to how we would gather
resources and intelligence on a new planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0033
rows.name:
A special team with the code name "Frontier" was
assembled to tackle the issue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0034
rows.name:
I was one of many researchers involved. Even after the
White Whale took off, we kept working on the problem
around the clock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0035
rows.name:
We barely ate... I don't even know if we slept.
We just knew there wasn't a moment to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0036
rows.name:
And then, finally, we finished a working version of
what would come to be FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0037
rows.name:
When the Ganglion attacked the White Whale,
our lab came under fire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0038
rows.name:
My team, our data... It all came crashing down to
Mira along with everything else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0039
rows.name:
And so far as I know, I'm the only one left.
I've even used FrontierNav to search for them,
but...yeah. Nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0070
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that her team would be proud of her.

rows.label: qev017301_JNK0080
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev017301_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Kirsty how she survived when the others didn't.

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0040
rows.name:
Thanks. I try to remember that. I know my colleagues
wouldn't want me to dwell on the past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0041
rows.name:
Dumb luck. I was in another part of the ship,
briefing the Coalition forces on FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0042
rows.name:
If I had been back in the lab, I'd be...
Well, I'd be with the rest of my team.
Wherever that is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0043
rows.name:
Sorry. I know there's no use dwelling on it now.
I survived, so I owe it to the others to do something
useful with my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0044
rows.name:
Getting back to the point, our team was working with
five of these data units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0045
rows.name:
Each one contains data on a top-secret,
second-generation version of FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0046
rows.name:
Even after FrontierNav was complete, the rest of my
team continued to pursue their research voluntarily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0047
rows.name:
I don't think Nagi knows about this.
Hell, even I don't know all the finer details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0048
rows.name:
My friends gave all they had to ensure the future
prosperity of humankind, and I want to honor that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0049
rows.name:
But there's still one data unit missing.
If I can track it down, will you go out there
and recover it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0050
rows.name: Together we can uncover my friends' final legacy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017301_MSG0051
rows.name:
It would mean the world to me,
[ST:playername ]. Please consider it?[ST:wait ]
